mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT u.id, u.name, u.depot_id, u.depot_type, u.dept_id, u.user_type, u.remark, u.nation, u.certificate_type, u.card_id, u.birthday, u.phone, u.address, u.gender FROM sys_pass_process p LEFT JOIN sys_depot_user AS u ON u.id = p.discern_id WHERE u.del_flag = '0' and DATEDIFF(p.create_time,NOW())=-1

SELECT u.id, u.name, u.depot_id, u.depot_type, u.dept_id, u.user_type, u.remark, u.nation, u.certificate_type, u.card_id, u.birthday, u.phone, u.address, u.gender FROM sys_depot_user u join sys_user_relation r on u.id=r.member_id WHERE r.user_id=#{id} and u.del_flag = '0'

SELECT DISTINCT u.id FROM sys_depot_user AS u LEFT JOIN sys_dict_item AS d ON u.dept_id = d.`value` WHERE d.type = 'class_type' AND d.del_flag = 1 AND u.del_flag = 0 AND (u.user_type = 1 OR u.user_type = 3)
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT u.id FROM sys_depot_user AS u LEFT JOIN sys_dept AS d ON u.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE (d.del_flag = 1 ) AND u.del_flag = 0 AND (u.user_type = 2 OR u.user_type = 9)

SELECT DISTINCT a.id as '人员编号',case a.gender when 0 then '男' WHEN 1 THEN '女' ELSE '未知' END as '性别',case a.user_type when 1 then '学生' else '家长' END as'人员类型',b.label as '班级/部门',c.label as '证件类型',a.name as '姓名', a.card_id as '证件号' FROM sys_depot_user as a, sys_dict_item as b,sys_dict_item as c where b.type = 'class_type' and b.del_flag = 0 and a.dept_id =b.`value` and c.type = 'certificate_type' and c.del_flag = 0 and a.certificate_type =c.`value` and (user_type = 1 or user_type = 3) and a.del_flag = 0 UNION SELECT DISTINCT a.id as '人员编号',case a.gender when 0 then '男' WHEN 1 THEN '女' ELSE '未知' END as '性别',case a.user_type when 2 then '教职工' else '未知' END as'人员类型',b.dept_name as '班级/部门',c.label as '证件类型',a.name as '姓名', a.card_id as '证件号' FROM sys_depot_user as a, sys_dept as b,sys_dict_item as c where b.dept_id = a.dept_id and b.del_flag = 0 and c.type = 'certificate_type' and c.del_flag = 0 and a.certificate_type =c.`value` and (user_type = 2 or user_type = 9) and a.del_flag = 0
